yuda aparadha parikshanaya nawathwanna hitapu amarikanu thanapathiniya illayi kirthi warnakulasuriya shri lankawata erehi yudha aparadha parikshanaya wahama athhituwannayi hitapu amarikanu thanapathini theresa shepar amarikanu rajayen saha jiniwa manawa himikam komasaris seyid rad husengen illa atha.amarikanu rajya departhamenthuwe hitapu balawath niladhariniyak wu aya shri lankawe mithurange sahaya mada jiniwa manawa himikam komisamata, sahajiwana ha sanhindiya komisame nirdesha kriyathmaka kirimata salasumak idiripath kala yuthu bawada sandahan kara thibe.amarikanu rajaya methek anugamanaya kala dadi piliwetha wenuwata mrudu piliwethak diyath kala yuthu bawada theresa shepar wadiduratath prakasha kara atha.jiniwa manawa himikam komisama meheyawu yuda aparadha parikshanaye wimarshana warthawa marthu 27 da prakashayata path kirimata niyamithaya.shri lankawe nawa rajayata amarikawa saha yuropaya samaga sabandatha wardhanaya kara ganimata shri lankawata erehi yuda aparadha parikshanaya nathara kala yuthu bawada hitapu amarikanu thanapathiniya prakasha kara atha.age mema illima hitapu amarikanu thanapathi niladhariyaku wu robat ke bogsda anumatha kara thibe.shri lankawata erehi yuda aparadha wimarshanayan nathara karana lesa hitapu amarikanu thanapathi niladhariniyak illa sitiye mul warataya.theresa sheparge mema illimata amarikanu rajaya ekanga wuwoth eya koti dayas porawe barapathala parajayak we.diwayina
